channel.title: Teleporting Error [Pi]

item.title: Teleporting Error [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

This is my code for my varrock teleport and when I click it it some shit shows up in the run cmd… And for every single other teleport it does this also. I’ll rep if I can get a solution.

Here’s my teleport code:

case 50235: case 4140: case 117112: if(c.inWild() && c.wildLevel > Config.NO_TELEPORT_WILD_LEVEL) { c.sendMessage("You can't teleport above level "+Config.NO_TELEPORT_WILD_LEVEL+" in the wilderness."); return; } if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(556, 3) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(554, 1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(563, 1) && c.playerLevel[6] > 24) { c.getPA().startTeleport(3213, 3423, 0, "modern"); c.getItems().deleteItem2(556, 3); c.getItems().deleteItem2(554, 1); c.getItems().deleteItem2(563, 1); c.getPA().addSkillXP(6, 35); } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have the required items and or level."); } break;

Heres the error in run cmd…

[5/20/12 6:29 PM]: Andrew - actionbutton: 4143 [5/20/12 6:29 PM]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 41 [5/20/12 6:29 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerAssistant.addSkillXP(Playe rAssistant.java:2341) [5/20/12 6:29 PM]: at server.model.players.packets.ClickingButtons.processP acket(ClickingButtons.java:117) [5/20/12 6:29 PM]: at server.model.players.PacketHandler.processPacket(Pack etHandler.java:142) [5/20/12 6:29 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Clie nt.java:937) [5/20/12 6:29 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:135) [5/20/12 6:29 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:154)

Read full topic
